p: The chromatogram obtained were analysed by using Chromas 2.6.4 (Technelysium, Queensland, Australia). The sequences were manually corrected and compared with other sequences available in Genbank using BLASTn. Their genotype were then obtained using the RVA online classification tool RotaC 2.0v ( http://rotac.regatools.be/) [ 45]. The nucleotide sequences were submitted to GenBank and the accession numbers can be found in S1 Table.
